item.description:
EVENT: Come join us for a fun afternoon and some exercise as we go ice-skating at the Daly Memorial Rink at 4 Nonantum rd. This Rink offers a lot of us the chance to get out of the house and enjoy an afternoon with some friends in a traditional winter activity. Check out the rink at: http://www.newtoncoun...
We will be skating for a couple of hours and then the plans are to go out for a cup of coffee and maybe a snack afterwards.

Trip's Coordinator: Heather P

RSVP: Required by February 19th, Please include a cell number in your rsvp so that Heather can make contact with you on the 20th.
MEET: Sunday at 3 PM
COST: $5 admission, skate rentals are available and $5 for Mosaic guests

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Ice Skating Party at Daly Rink in Newton
